name: Cosmic Lilith Passive T3
passiveSkills: Grants +50% increase to all stats in battle
Grant Immunity to Doom and Perfect Death to all allies
Inflict Passive Disable and 3 Physical Burns on a random enemy for 2 turns at the start of your turn and after every action
All allies attacks will land with perfect hits until they die
This Talisman's effects only activates when equipped to a Lilith or Cosmic Lilith character
It does not activate on Dark Lilith.
